entry.title: Github Activity Aside for Octopress
entry.content: While working on my new Octopress powered site I began to look at the plugins provided by default. The Github repo plugin didn’t really show what I wanted on my site so I refactored it to show my GitHub activity instead. I’ve only coded about 7 or so event types thus far but I will continue to work on this plugin and release it on GitHub of course.
